 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָקַשׁ‎</span>] **verb** only **Pi\`el** 3 masculine plural, probably denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶקֶשׁ‎</span> = ==take the aftermath==, i.e. ***take everything*** ([[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]] in [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Hiob 26, 6</sup>) (&gt; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לקשׁ‎</span>, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***schnell zusammenraffen*** [compare [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>2668</sup>]); — ***despoil***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְכֶרֶם רָשָׁע יְלֵַקּשׁוּ ׃‎</span> [[Job.24.6|Job 24:6]] ***and the vineyard of the wicked*** (but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשִׁיר‎</span> ***the rich*** [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]) ***they despoil*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַר‎</span>).
